name: National Voter File
description: We provide an easy-to-use, modern-era database with voter files for each of the fifty states. This is the start of a pulling politics into the 21st century, starting from the ground up.

name: Issue Voter
description: Receive targeted alerts before Congress votes, Send your opinion directly to your rep, and Track your repâ€™s votes and bill outcomes.

name: Carpool Vote
description: Carpool Vote is a platform that introduces volunteer drivers to people who need a ride to the polling station. Like Uber, but for elections!

name: Phone Your Rep
description: PhoneYourRep will allow a user to use location data to identify all their representatives and download contact info with one click or QR code.

name: AlwaysForwardUS
description: Government should work for the 99%, not just the wealthy & privileged. We accomplish that by building a reflective democracy, one that includes everyone and where all voices are heard.

name: Code Corps
description: Building a better future together. Work on open source for social good.

name: Maps for Change
description: Map for presenting data from events-etl and OSDI

name: Movement
description: We help campaigns organize volunteers without paying for software or hiring staff. Volunteers can match to candidates, learn to canvass, and find doors to knock on.

name: ProgCode Core
description: We are building a team to make ProgCode a strong and sustainable network.
